rationale: This species has a wide  distribution, ranging from Sri Lanka through Thailand, Malaysia,  Indonesia and possibly the Philippines (Chace 1983), occurring in fast flowing streams, usually in upland areas. Although localized subsistence fishing for this species is known to occur, no specific threats to the species could be identified. In view of its wide distribution and the absence of any known, major threats, the species is considered of Least Concern.
assessor: De Grave, S., Klotz, W. & Page, T.
